Sentencas: This work is aimed at understanding the reaction mechanism of propane internal reforming in the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Fuel processing in direct propane solid oxide fuel cell and carbon dioxide reforming of propane over Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: This mechanism is important for the design and operation of SOFC internal processing of hydrocarbons.
Titulo: Fuel processing in direct propane solid oxide fuel cell and carbon dioxide reforming of propane over Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: An anode-supported SOFC unit with Ni-YSZ anode operating at 800 degrees C was tested with direct feeding of 5% propane.
Titulo: Fuel processing in direct propane solid oxide fuel cell and carbon dioxide reforming of propane over Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: CO2 reforming of propane was carried out in a reactor with Ni-YSZ catalyst to simulate internal propane processing in SOFC.
Titulo: Fuel processing in direct propane solid oxide fuel cell and carbon dioxide reforming of propane over Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: The performance of this direct propane SOFC is stable.
Titulo: Fuel processing in direct propane solid oxide fuel cell and carbon dioxide reforming of propane over Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: The C specie formed over the anode functional layer of SOFC can be completely removed.
Titulo: Fuel processing in direct propane solid oxide fuel cell and carbon dioxide reforming of propane over Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: The major gas products of SOFC are H-2, CO, CH4, C2H4 and CO2.
Titulo: Fuel processing in direct propane solid oxide fuel cell and carbon dioxide reforming of propane over Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: Pseudo-steady-state internal processing of propane in the anode catalytic layer of SOFC is associated with a CO2/C3H8 molar ratio of about 1.26 and basically CO2 reforming of propane.
Titulo: Fuel processing in direct propane solid oxide fuel cell and carbon dioxide reforming of propane over Ni-YSZ

Sentencas: CO2 dissociation to produce the O species to oxidize the C species from dehydrogenation and dissociation of propane and its fragments should be the major reaction during CO2 reforming of propane.
Titulo: Fuel processing in direct propane solid oxide fuel cell and carbon dioxide reforming of propane over Ni-YSZ
